import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCircle } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { AddToCartButton } from "./addToCartButton"; import 'flowbite' export function ProductCard(props){ const [showAlert, setShowAlert] = useState(false); // State to manage alert visibility // Function to toggle the alert const toggleAlert = () => { setShowAlert(!showAlert); console.log('test') } return ( <>
{props.itemName}

Product ID: {props.itemData.id}

Colour:
Sizes: {props.itemData.size}
Category: {props.itemData.category}
Â£{props.itemData.price}
{showAlert && (
Info
Item Successfully added to cart!
)}
) }
